text: Oho lona ba-kholoang! Ebang bathusi ba Allah, joaloka ha Jesu mora oa Maria a ne a re ho barutuoa ba hae: “Ke ba feng bao e tlang ho ba bathusi ba ka tsebeletsong ea Allah?” Barutuoa ba re: “Re bathusi ba Allah.” Joale, lequloana la bana ba Israele le ile la kholoa, ha le leng lona le latola tumelo. Empa, Ra matlafatsa ba khotsoeng khahlano le lira tsa bona, ea eba bahloli
